# TS Objects

A time series can be thought of as a list of numbers, along with some information about what times those numbers were recorded. You can use the `ts()` object, or the tidyverse `tsibble()`.

```{r}
library(tsibble)


y <- ts(c(1, 34, 454, 34, 6), start = 2012)

y %>% as_tibble()
```
